title: Flames of Desire
description: Lexi Carrington is a teacher seeking sun, sea and whatever else may come her way, determined to start enjoying her life again. Millie Simpson is a fire fighter, on vacation trying to recover after a messy divorce from her wife.After the two have a chance meeting, the spark between them ignites immediately. But circumstances soon conspire to pull them apart with dangerous consequences.Is Lexi and Millie's love strong enough to keep their desire burning, or will the flames consume them?
author: R.T. Lucas
